name: Mug
howToCare: Wash me by hand. Dry me carefully
howToMove: Wrap me in paper that protects me and put me in a box
totalProductionTime: 15 days, which is equivalent to the first five seasons of Big Bang Theory
title: Ceramist

name: Anemone
whatMadeOf: High quality cardboard. The color does not change over time and does not attract dust
howToCare: Keep me out of the wind. Avoid moving me too much. Dust me gently
howToMove: Carry me in a package of a similar size to mine, containing packaging to hold me in place
totalProductionTime: 8 days, which is equivalent Friends Marathon
title: Paper Artist

name: Single Flower Jar
whatMadeOf: A thick volcanic armor, a rough and harsh skin, apparently insensitive to life, but which can hide a flowery bed
howToCare: For cleaning me, use a soft brush to remove dust. Make me beautiful for your guests
howToMove: Use a suitably sized box containing soft packaging to hold me in place
totalProductionTime: 12 days, which is equivalent to fourteen football matches
title: Ceramist
